data.title: MOTA ENGIL stock price / EGL.LIS share quote summary
data.meta_description: Thinking of buying or selling MOTA ENGIL stock that’s listed in a currency different from your local one? Use our international stock ticker to check and convert stocks and shares easily in any currency you need.
data.text:
What is the current performance of EGL.LIS stock?

As of 13-08-2024, the stock price stands at 3.41 EUR. The market has seen 0.04 EUR change in the price of a EGL.LIS share, representing 1.1269% change from the previous close of 3.37 EUR.

On 13-08-2024 EGL.LIS stock opened at 3.37 EUR, reached a high of 3.41 EUR, and a low of 3.29 EUR. The adjusted closing price is 3.41 EUR, while the closing price is 3.41 EUR. Adjusted close is the closing price after adjustments for all applicable splits and dividend distributions whereas the closing price refers to the last price at which a stock traded during the trading session.

The volume of shares traded yesterday was 1082411, indicating the level of market activity.

MOTA ENGIL during the last trading day has seen a high of 3.41 EUR and a low of 3.29 EUR.

What is the live share price of MOTA ENGIL?

When you own a share, you possess a stake – or equity – in a company. The proportion of the company you own is determined by the number of shares you own in relation to the total number of available shares.

That means if you own one share of MOTA ENGIL, you only own a fraction of the company. The share price tells you how much investors believe that fraction of the company is worth.

Owning a piece of MOTA ENGIL is currently worth 3.41 EUR.

Please keep in mind that stock prices and information may fluctuate throughout the trading day.
